item.description:
Raw Food Made Easy: Booksigning, Lecture and Free Samples

Jennifer is a raw food chef and author based in Chicago. She offers courses, personalized training and raw chef certifications. Jennifer will be in our area for a book signing for two consecutive nights. The 2nd night's info is:
Tuesday, April 15, 2008
Raw Food Made Easy: Booksigning, Lecture and Free Samples
Location: Boston Area, Goodness Me
Time: Tuesday, 6:00-8:00 pm
Registration: Call Harvest Co-op Market, 617-661-1580
Cost: Free

Jennifer's first book, Raw Food Made Easy for 1 or 2 People, has already sold over 50,000 copies and is consistently on the Amazon.com bestselling cookbook lists (according to her web site). She has recently released the companion DVD, Raw Food Made Easy, which you can order at http://www.learnrawfo....

Her web site is
http://www.learnrawfo... where you can learn more about her offerings.

There will be no one from Boston Raw Food Group to greet you at this event.
item.name: Raw Food Made Easy: Booksigning, Lecture and Free Samples
